com.rd.recorder

接口 AudioPlayer.OnInfoListener

  • 封闭类:
    AudioPlayer

    public static interface AudioPlayer.OnInfoListener
    Interface definition of a callback to be invoked to communicate some info and/or warning about the media or its playback.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean onInfo(AudioPlayer mp, int what, int extra)
      Called to indicate an info or a warning.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onInfo

        boolean onInfo(AudioPlayer mp,
               int what,
               int extra)
        Called to indicate an info or a warning.
        参数:
        mp - the MediaPlayer the info pertains to.
        what - the type of info or warning.
        • AudioPlayer.MEDIA_INFO_UNKNOWN
        • AudioPlayer.MEDIA_INFO_VIDEO_TRACK_LAGGING
        • AudioPlayer.MEDIA_INFO_BAD_INTERLEAVING
        • AudioPlayer.MEDIA_INFO_NOT_SEEKABLE
        • AudioPlayer.MEDIA_INFO_METADATA_UPDATE
        extra - an extra code, specific to the info. Typically implementation dependant.
        返回:
        True if the method handled the info, false if it didn't. Returning false, or not having an OnErrorListener at all, will cause the info to be discarded.
